HI,

Not too sure where to start but I'm a 24 year old male with a VERY humiliating problem (at least to me). My PENIS farts. This is what my latest girlfriend called it. Although she says it's the cutest and sexiest thing she's ever seen, I cant begin to express how embarrassing this is to me.

It can be anything from a soft wet whistling sound to a very loud popping or air escaping quickly sound. Yes, just like regular fart but much higher pitched and can be about 5x as loud. (coming out of a smaller hole, I guess). During a typical hand job my PENIS can fart up to 30 times. My girlfriend seems to love it but I feel like crying. The gentlest squeeze especially at the base can elicit a fart but the worst is when I orgasm.

This is not a health issue as I've been doing this all me life. It doesn't hurt, in fact the vibrations alone can initiate an orgasm. Just humiliating. Most women don't say anything, some laugh but every girl who has witnessed this seems to be mesmerized by it.

Oldie but a goodie

Разумеется, Counter-Strike: Source — это ни в коем случае не Counter-Strike 2. О каких-то по-настоящему радикальных изменениях или новшествах и речи нет. По сути, мы получили прежнюю игру, завернутую в новую красивую упаковку. И, вы не поверите, именно этого и ждали фанаты CS. Из увлекательного сетевого экшена с паршивой графикой CS превратился в столь же увлекательный сетевой экшен, только с отличной и вполне себе современной графикой.

Me encantó en su momento, hace más de 10 años. Para mi gusto ha envejecido muy mal. Habiendo tantos y tan variados FPS que jugar, no me atrae un juego en el que la gente va dando saltitos para esquivar las balas, sólo hay un mapa (de_dust) y te hacen un headshot con la Desert Eagle a 100 metros. Se lo dejo a los fans que no juegan a otra cosa.
counter strike source is a fine first person shooting game with a lot of mods so there is a much different game plays in it i think every know css i will give it 5 out of 6 stars :D

This game would have been good if it wasn't for the community. I don't want to touch this game that often because I'm often encountering random sound downloads of random rap songs that I get very irritated by as well as players with huge amounts of bad language to the point where that also gets annoying. You know, that whole gangster bullcrap. Nerds shouldn't need to pretend to be gangster. Or 14 year old angsty teenagers shouldn't need to do so either. Forget this game. The only upside is that it provides good models that you could use in Garry's Mod, but other than that, it sucks.

世界中で一番遊ばれているFPS「Counter-Strike」を、
Sourceエンジンを用いてリメイクしたゲーム。
元はハーフライフのMODとしてリリースされた物。
プレイヤーは、カウンターテロリスト（特殊部隊）とテロリストに別れ、
爆弾設置・解除、人質救出・阻止、VIP警護、エリア脱出などで対決する。
サーバーも個人で立てられるので、真面目な物からネタ鯖まで色々。
FPS好きならば一度遊んでみるといいかもしれないゲーム。
Just Amazing.

This game is one of my favorite to date, not the original counter terrorist vs terrorist. But the Mod "Zombie Escape" which adds the final touch to this game which makes it so unique and fun to play for hours on end. This game is also great because it doesant require a topnotch system to run it even after the graphics have been highly upgraded. So if you've got a spare few bob in your pocket i suggest buying this!

FTW!

This Source-updated version of the classic online shooter Counter-Strike has been going strong ever since it was released back in 2004. Decent balancing, solid map designs, and simple gameplay all work for it. Of course, it's become extremely stale now, and Valve acknowledged this with the update to the Orange Box engine and Team Fortress 2-style arcadey additions (which weren't well-received by the community, mind you). Overall, I'd say avoid it now, but back in the day it wasn't bad.

Einfach nur genial

You are to take two roles in this game,one is terrorist and one is counter-terrorist. There are three legit gameplay styles created by the main creators of this game.VIP escorting,bomb defusing and hostage rescue as counter terrorist.And as a Terrorist you need to do it the other way.At the VIP escorting,you keep escorting the same guy and the terrorists try to kill him.In bomb defuse missions you keep defending the same places and you never get to kill the arm dealer of the terrorists.It's been 10 years and no counter-terrorist unit or leader was able to expose or try to look for a way to kill the arm dealer of the Terrorists.They keep getting the c4s somewhere it is like neverending.And in the hostage rescue mission you keep rescuing the same guys and then they get captured again.Even if they die they have powers to come back to life after the round is over and if you rescue them they will respawn at the terrorist base anyway. Despite all it is a good tactical shooter game.

I absolutely love this, now, classic shooter. I've spent a lot of time practicing at being a decent player, which is something I feel many shooters don't have. It's almost like grinding, in a positive way, where you play the same maps over and over to know them inside and out. CS: Source and now CS:GO still to this day have this great quality. I can't think of many games that I've put this much time into, even certain RPGs don't have as many hours put into them as I have put into this game specifically.
Melhor jogo ja feito , vale cada centavo

Great game! Graphicly its Kind of Out of Date somewhat But still Looks Good on High everything and doesn't require a good high end computer or nothing fancy. The community of the game is really BIG! Servers are Plentiful infact so much that some servers Don't even Have people Playing. Lots of mods for the game EX: Zombie server Mods and Gungame Mods, and you don't Need to download anything as the servers supply you with the mods for that specific server. This game allows allot of customizable things from Maps,Guns.Hostages,Player Skins,Counter terrerorist and Terrerorist Skinging is also avaliable.  But NOTE: This game isnt Noob friendly Takes time to learn the Skills you need to survive longer and longer for everygame but Like war you need Luck to also stay alive. 
Other Notes: Im running on a 2.4athlon ghz CPU, 1.25gig of rams, nvidia 8600GTS 512mb, and the rest are stock. Although I highly reccomend Cable or DSL Internet to play this game with Low Lag and Ping.
